item.description:
Saturday they're calling for 80 Degree Weather!!

This ride will begin at the beginning of River Rd in Watertown very close to the center of Watertown.

The roads that meet River Rd. are Galen and N. Beacon (there is plenty of street parking along River Rd)

See attached link and find where the #1 pointer is located.....

http://www.mapquest.c...

Pace will be 10-12 miles per hour but this pace will likely be affected due to the heavy traffic on the paths due to the nice weather.

I guesstimate that this ride is no more than 12-15 miles, if that. I think with the slower pace due to traffic it will take us about 2 1/2 hours. Bring a frisbee in case we stop for a short bit on the charles to catch some rays.

Helmets always highly recommended. A good bell is good for the paths to warn walkers.


My cell on the day of the ride is 617-894-8454

Warm Regards,

Rob Fox
Organizer
item.how_to_find_us: My cell on the day of the ride 617-894-8454
item.name: Charles River Bike Path Ride via towns of Watertown, Waltham, Brighton, & Boston
